targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" = 'eth0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'pppoe1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'wg0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'bond0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'bond0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'br0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'pppoe1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") *0.22/1000 FROM "power" WHERE "host" = 'mainpower' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "power" WHERE "host" = 'mainpower' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)

targets.expr: sum((rate(probe_all_success_sum[$__range]) OR rate(probe_success_sum[$__range])) * on (instance, job, probe, config_version) group_left(check_name) max(sm_check_info{check_name="ping", region=~".*"}) by (instance, job, probe, config_version, check_name)) by (instance, job, check_name) / sum((rate(probe_all_success_count[$__range]) OR rate(probe_success_count[$__range])) * on (instance, job, probe, config_version) group_left(check_name) max(sm_check_info{check_name="ping", region=~".*"}) by (instance, job, probe, config_version, check_name)) by (instance, check_name, job)

sum((rate(probe_all_duration_seconds_sum[$__range]) OR rate(probe_duration_seconds_sum[$__range])) * on (instance, job, probe, config_version) group_left(check_name) max(sm_check_info{check_name="ping", region=~".*"}) by (instance, job, probe, config_version, check_name)) by (instance, job, check_name) / sum((rate(probe_all_duration_seconds_count[$__range]) OR rate(probe_duration_seconds_count[$__range])) * on (instance, job, probe, config_version) group_left(check_name) max(sm_check_info{check_name="ping", region=~".*"}) by (instance, job, probe, config_version, check_name)) by (instance, job, check_name)
